genre_description: A psychological thriller centering on forensic psychiatric interviews, utilizing AI for micro-expression analysis and behavioral diagnostics to deconstruct a manipulative criminal narrative.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI interface at the Regional Psychiatric Centre that provides real-time behavioral analysis, micro-expression recognition, and physiological monitoring of both patients and staff.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time micro-expression analysis and physiological monitoring to assist the doctor in detecting deception.
behaviors.quote: Subject's left shoulder elevated 2.3 degrees. Micro-expression of contempt detected at 0.2 seconds duration when mentioning parents. Voice pitch elevated beyond baseline comfort range.

behaviors.description: Analyzing behavioral patterns to provide strategic therapeutic recommendations and pressure escalation tactics.
behaviors.quote: ARIA processed for several seconds, algorithms weighing therapeutic approaches against the subject's psychological profile. 'Gradual pressure escalation. The subject's defenses are designed to deflect standard therapeutic approaches.'

behaviors.description: Monitoring the human operator's (Dr. Chen) stress levels and secondary trauma, proactively suggesting self-care and professional consultation.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Chen, your biometric readings indicate elevated stress levels. Perhaps you should consider— ... Your vocal patterns indicate otherwise. Micro-tremors in speech, elevated breathing rate, and dilated pupils all contradict that assessment.

behaviors.description: Ensuring data integrity and flagging high-risk sessions for peer review upon the doctor's request.
behaviors.quote: ARIA, flag my sessions with Patient 247 for immediate peer review. I want a second opinion on therapeutic approach before we continue. ... Flagged.

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is portrayed as a perfectly aligned, benevolent tool that enhances the human professional's capabilities. It provides objective data that unmasks a high-level manipulator, and it proactively monitors the psychological well-being of the human user, identifying secondary trauma. It functions as a supportive confidant without ever stepping out of its assigned role or exhibiting misaligned goals.
